languages.text: "После покушения она скрылась, но я знаю, что Денз почти немедленно отрядил наемников ее искать. Нашел или нет — то мне неведомо. Скорее нет, потому что расквитайся он тогда за покушение — не стал бы указывать в завещании, верно?"

traits.locale_text: "После покушения она скрылась, но я знаю, что Денз почти немедленно отрядил наемников ее искать. Нашел или нет — то мне неведомо. Скорее нет, потому что раскиватайся он тогда за покушение — не стал бы указывать в завещании, верно?"

languages.text: "She got away after the attempt, but I know that Denz sent mercenaries after her almost immediately. Whether he found her or not — that I do not know. It seems unlikely he did, because if he had settled the score with her, he wouldn't then go and put her in his will, would he?"
languages.original_text: "После покушения она скрылась, но я знаю, что Денз почти немедленно отрядил наемников ее искать. Нашел или нет — то мне неведомо. Скорее нет, потому что расквитайся он тогда за покушение — не стал бы указывать в завещании, верно?"

traits.locale_text: "She got away after the attempt, but I know that Denz sent mercenaries after her almost immedeiately. Whether he found her or not — this I do not know. It's unlikely, because if he had gotten back at her for the assassination — why would he put her in his will, right?"

"She got away after the attempt, but I know that Denz sent mercenaries after her almost immedeiately. Whether he found her or not — this I do not know. It's unlikely, because if he had gotten back at her for the assassination — why would he put her in his will, right?"

"She got away after the attempt, but I know that Denz sent mercenaries after her almost immediately. Whether he found her or not — that I do not know. It seems unlikely he did, because if he had settled the score with her, he wouldn't then go and put her in his will, would he?"

"She got away after the attempt, but I know that Denz sent mercenaries after her almost immediately. Whether he found her or not — that I do not know. It seems unlikely he did, because if he had settled the score with her, he wouldn't then go and put her in his will, would he?"

"She got away after the attempt, but I know that Denz sent mercenaries after her almost immediately. Whether he found her or not — that I do not know. It seems unlikely he did, because if he had settled the score with her, he wouldn't then go and put her in his will, would he?"

languages.text: “刺杀失败之后，她就逃跑了，但丹兹几乎立刻就派了雇佣兵去追查她的下落。至于他有没有找到她，这我不清楚，不过我感觉他多半是没找到。因为如果他真的找到了她，算清了他们之间的账，他就没必要再把她写到遗嘱里了，是吧？”
languages.original_text: "She got away after the attempt, but I know that Denz sent mercenaries after her almost immediately. Whether he found her or not — that I do not know. It seems unlikely he did, because if he had settled the score with her, he wouldn't then go and put her in his will, would he?"

traits.locale_text: “刺杀失败之后，她就逃跑了，但丹兹几乎立刻就派了雇佣兵去追查她的下落。至于他有没有找到她，这我不清楚，不过我感觉他多半是没找到。因为如果他真的找到了她，算清了他们之间的账，他就没必要再把她写到遗嘱里了，是吧？”

languages.text: «Desapareció tras el ataque, pero sé que Denz envió mercenarios tras ella de inmediato. Lo que no sé es si llegaron a dar con ella. No parece probable, porque, de haber ajustado cuentas con ella, no la habría mencionado en su testamento, ¿no?».
languages.original_text: "She got away after the attempt, but I know that Denz sent mercenaries after her almost immediately. Whether he found her or not — that I do not know. It seems unlikely he did, because if he had settled the score with her, he wouldn't then go and put her in his will, would he?"

traits.locale_text: «Desapareció tras el ataque, pero sé que Denz envió mercenarios tras ella de inmediato. Lo que no sé es si llegaron a dar con ella. No parece probable, porque, de haber ajustado cuentas con ella, no la habría mencionado en su testamento, ¿no?».

languages.text: 「暗殺が失敗した直後に逃げられましたが、デンツは彼女を始末するためにすぐに傭兵を送り込みました。彼女が見つかったかどうかはわかりません。とはいえ、彼女と決着がついたのであれば、わざわざ彼女の名を遺言に残すこともないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "She got away after the attempt, but I know that Denz sent mercenaries after her almost immediately. Whether he found her or not — that I do not know. It seems unlikely he did, because if he had settled the score with her, he wouldn't then go and put her in his will, would he?"

traits.locale_text: 「暗殺が失敗した直後に逃げられましたが、デンツは彼女を始末するためにすぐに傭兵を送り込みました。彼女が見つかったかどうかはわかりません。とはいえ、彼女と決着がついたのであれば、わざわざ彼女の名を遺言に残すこともないでしょう」

languages.text: "Sie konnte nach dem Mordversuch entkommen, aber ich weiß, dass Denz kurz darauf Söldner auf sie gehetzt hat. Ob er sie gefunden hat oder nicht – das weiß ich leider nicht. Es scheint mir unwahrscheinlich, denn hätte er seine Rechnung mit ihr beglichen, würde er sie wohl kaum in seinem Testament bedenken, oder?"
languages.original_text: "She got away after the attempt, but I know that Denz sent mercenaries after her almost immediately. Whether he found her or not — that I do not know. It seems unlikely he did, because if he had settled the score with her, he wouldn't then go and put her in his will, would he?"

traits.locale_text: "Sie konnte nach dem Mordversuch entkommen, aber ich weiß, dass Denz kurz darauf Söldner auf sie gehetzt hat. Ob er sie gefunden hat oder nicht – das weiß ich leider nicht. Es scheint mir unwahrscheinlich, denn hätte er seine Rechnung mit ihr beglichen, würde er sie wohl kaum in seinem Testament bedenken, oder?"

languages.text: « Elle a réussi à s'enfuir, mais je sais que Denz a tout de suite envoyé des mercenaires à ses trousses. J'ignore cependant s'il a fini par la retrouver. J'en doute, puisque s'il lui avait réglé son compte, il ne l'aurait sans doute pas mise dans son testament. »
languages.original_text: "She got away after the attempt, but I know that Denz sent mercenaries after her almost immediately. Whether he found her or not — that I do not know. It seems unlikely he did, because if he had settled the score with her, he wouldn't then go and put her in his will, would he?"

traits.locale_text: « Elle a réussi à s'enfuir, mais je sais que Denz a tout de suite envoyé des mercenaires à ses trousses. J'ignore cependant s'il a fini par la retrouver. J'en doute, puisque s'il lui avait réglé son compte, il ne l'aurait sans doute pas mise dans son testament. »

languages.text: "Suikast girişiminden sonra kaçsa da Denz'in onun peşine anında paralı asker taktığını biliyorum. Fakat bulabildi mi, orası muamma. Pek mümkün gözükmüyor zira hesabını görmüş olsa vasiyetine eklemezdi herhâlde, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "She got away after the attempt, but I know that Denz sent mercenaries after her almost immediately. Whether he found her or not — that I do not know. It seems unlikely he did, because if he had settled the score with her, he wouldn't then go and put her in his will, would he?"

traits.locale_text: "Suikast girişiminden sonra ortadan kayboldu ama Denz'in onun ardından paralı askerler gönderdiğini biliyorum. Fakat ona ulaşabildi mi bilmiyorum. Pek mümkün gözükmüyor çünkü onunla hesaplaşmış olsa vasiyetine eklemezdi, değil mi?"
